main event: A sighting of a cigar-shaped, drawn fluorescent object reported in Westbury, Long Island, N.Y. on 16 September 1953.
interesting points: The object was dark-colored and fell both front and rear,It was observed for 2-4 seconds,No sound was reported during the observation,The conclusion suggested it could be a balloon or aircraft,The sighting is part of the Project Blue Book investigations.
